config.description: Message displayed when the player starts a battle.
config.defaultValue: Y'all ready to harvest some defeat? My crops are growing strong, and so am I!

config.description: Message displayed when the NPC is defeated.
config.defaultValue: Looks like the crop wasn't ripe for a win... Guess I'll try again next season!
